sentences.sContent: Nelson Mandela had received tens of thousands of votes more than anyone else in the initial poll.
sentences.sCn: 调查一开始，纳尔逊·曼德拉就收到了数以万计的选票，远超过其他任何人。

sentences.sContent: The next day, at the White House, I held a reception for Nelson Mandela with African-American religious leaders.
sentences.sCn: 第二天，我和非裔美国宗教领袖们一起在白宫主持接待了纳尔逊·曼德拉。

sentences.sContent: The exchange is said to have happened when both were in South Africa as guests of President Nelson Mandela in 1997.
sentences.sCn: 据说，这场交易发生在1997年，当 时她和泰勒都作为南非总统纳尔逊·曼德拉的客人访问南非。

trans.tranCn: 纳尔逊•曼德拉（前南非共和国总统）
